data: I cannot deny that I was entirely to blame for the calamity that overtook Ulysses; and if I call attention to the high social and literary standing of the gentleman whom I employed as an accomplice in the affair, it is not at all with the hope of thereby lessening my own responsibility.
The Fall of Ulysses: An Elephant Story
Willard, Charles Dwight, 1866-1914; Ver Beck, Frank, 1858-1933 [Illustrator]
